name: Mercurius corrosivus
Relationship: Compare: ARS.; LACH.; LEONURUS - MOTHER-WORT (Influences pelvic organs, allays spasm and nervous irritability, promotes secretion and reduces febrile excitement. Valuable in suppressed menses and LOCHIA; dysentery; vomiting, frightful pains in abdomen, violent thirst. Tongue dry and cracked). MONSONIA - An African plant belonging to the Geraniaceae - (Used for dysentery in material doses).Antidote: CALCIUM SULPHIDE is antidotal to Bichloride poisoning. Use intravenous injection of 7 1/2 grains in 7 1/2 oz. boiled water.

Eyes: Iris muddy in color, thick, and neither contracts nor dilates
Pain behind eyeballs, as if forced out
Pain severe at night; burning, shooting, tearing
Head: Delirium, stupor
Drawing pain in periosteum of skull
Frontal pain, congestion of head, with burning in cheeks
Urine: Urine hot, burning, scanty or suppressed; bloody, greenish discharge
Stabbing pain extending up urethra into bladder
Stool: Stool hot, bloody, slimy, offensive, with cutting pains and shreds of mucous membranes
Dysentery; tenesmus, not relieved by stool; incessant
Abdomen: Bruised sensation; caecal region and transverse colon painful
Bloated; very painful to least touch
Respiratory: Pain in larynx as cut with knife
Nose: Ozaena, with perforation of septum nasi
Post-nasal swelling, mucous membrane dry, red, and covered with bloody mucus
Throat: Burning pain, with great swelling; worse, slight external pressure
Most pain is post-nasal with sharp pains to ears
Male: Gonorrhoea; urethra orifice red, swollen; glans sore and hot

details: This salt leads all other remedies in tenesmus of the rectum, which is incessant, and is not relieved by the stool. The tenesmus often involves the bladder as well. Bright's disease. Gonorrhea; second stage, with continuous tenesmus. Destroys the secreting portions of the kidneys. This process is slow, but sure. Albuminuria in early pregnancy. (PHOSPH. later and at full term).
dosage: Sixth potency. In solution 1: 1000, hypodermically injected under conjunctiva in choroiditis with progressive myopia. Stops immediately the severe aching pain behind eyeballs (Dr. G. D. Halle.)
